content:
Come to think of it... I've never really given much thought to my attitude towards life, hohoho!
Thank you for remembering to ask me.
info: 航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Regarding road sign design, everyone's ideas will be made into stamps and taken into consideration. You can choose the one that you like the most.
info: 航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Hoho, hearing everyone's different attitudes towards life will make the designs of our signs much more interesting.
info: 航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3

content:
Ah, I'm so sorry!
As a coordinator,
I'm used to focusing solely on others' opinions.
info: 航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3
航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3

content: But the final design of the road sign will be decided by <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>. If that's okay with you, shall we start designing it now?
info: 航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3
航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I'd like to hear your thoughts, Mobai.
info: 航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3

content: But I hope everyone's life is peaceful, no need to rush or panic. After all, everything can be sorted with a cup of tea. When the right time comes, things will effortlessly fall into place.
info: 航路生活态度完成-莫白_主流程文本3
